Curriculum vitae¶

  • The CEF levels view
  • The language knowledge model
  • The Property model
  • The Property model
  • The Property Type model
  • The Property Group model

The CEF levels view¶

Internal name:cv.CefLevel (CefLevel)

List of possible choices for the CEF level field of a language knowledge.

value Name text
A1   basic language skills
A2   basic language skills
A2+   basic language skills
B1   independent use of language
B2   independent use of language
B2+   independent use of language
C1   proficient use of language
C2   proficient use of language
C2+   proficient use of language

The language knowledge model¶

Internal name:cv.LanguageKnowledge
Implemented by:LanguageKnowledge

Views on language knowledge

  • language knowledges (LanguageKnowledges) (Menu Explorer ‣ CV ‣ language knowledges)
  • language knowledges (LanguageKnowledgesByPerson)
  • language knowledges (KnowledgesByLanguage)

Fields in language knowledge

  • ID (id, AutoField), Client (person, ForeignKey to Client), Sprache (language, ForeignKey to Sprache), spoken (spoken, ChoiceListField to HowWell), written (written, ChoiceListField to HowWell), native language (native, BooleanField), CEF level (cef_level, ChoiceListField to CEF levels)

The Property model¶

Internal name:properties.PersonProperty
Implemented by:PersonProperty

Views on Property

  • Properties (PersonProperties)
  • Properties (PropsByPerson)
  • Properties (PersonPropsByProp)
  • ConfiguredPropsByPerson (ConfiguredPropsByPerson)
  • Skills (SkillsByPerson)
  • Soft skills (SoftSkillsByPerson)
  • Obstacles (ObstaclesByPerson)

Fields in Property

  • ID (id, AutoField), Property group (group, ForeignKey to Property Group), Property (property, ForeignKey to Property), Value (value, CharField), Client (person, ForeignKey to Client), Remark (remark, CharField)

The Property model¶

Internal name:properties.Property
Implemented by:Property

Views on Property

  • Properties (Properties) (Menu Explorer ‣ Properties)
  • Properties (PropsByGroup) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Properties ‣ Skills)
  • Properties (PropsByType)

Fields in Property

  • ID (id, AutoField), Omschrijving (name, BabelCharField), Property Group (group, ForeignKey to Property Group), Property Type (type, ForeignKey to Property Type)

Tables referring to Property

  • Properties (PersonPropsByProp)

The Property Type model¶

Internal name:properties.PropType
Implemented by:PropType

Views on Property Type

  • Property Types (PropTypes) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Properties ‣ Property Types)

Fields in Property Type

  • ID (id, AutoField), Omschrijving (name, BabelCharField), Choices List (choicelist, CharField), default value (default_value, CharField), Limit to choices (limit_to_choices, BooleanField), Multiple choices (multiple_choices, BooleanField)

Tables referring to Property Type

  • Properties (PropsByType)
  • Property Choices (ChoicesByType)

The Property Group model¶

Internal name:properties.PropGroup
Implemented by:PropGroup

Views on Property Group

  • Property Groups (PropGroups) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Properties ‣ Property Groups)

Fields in Property Group

  • ID (id, AutoField), Omschrijving (name, BabelCharField)

Tables referring to Property Group

  • Properties (PropsByGroup) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Properties ‣ Skills)
